column2: inc.''' was the company that developed [[War in Middle Earth]]<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/wime.html War in Middle-Earth] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 7 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.giantbomb.com/jrr-tolkiens-war-in-middle-earth/61-19688/ WAr in Middle-Earth] at GiantBomb (retrieved 7 December 2010)</ref> in the United States.<ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi War in Middle-Earth] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 7 December 2010)</ref> It was founded in [[1978]] by [[Robert Clardy]] and ''Ann Dickens Clardy''.
